channel.title: Resume on Oliver Gutsche
channel.description: Recent content in Resume on Oliver Gutsche

item.description: List of Presentation and Talks O. Gutsche, The Future of Large Scale Scientific Computing - Trends in computing hardware, (2018), US ATLAS Workshop 2018 Open Day at the University of Pittsburgh, (Material) O. Gutsche, The Future of Large Scale Scientific Computing, (2018), Colloquium given at the Physics Department at the University of Massachusetts Amherst, (Material) O. Gutsche, Particle Physics - A world wide journey from recording particles to analysis using big computing, (2017), Plenary Talk at the Chicago Council on Science & Technology Panel: Fermilab and the New Frontiers of Physics, (Material)
